title: CRaFty PdX!
name: CRaFty PdX!
description:
A Map by Paiges

craft supplies, thirft stores, second hand retail, art supplies, places to buy spray paint, glitter, leather, zippers, buttons, t-shirts, yarn, string, stickers,......

properties.name: Buffalo Exchange
properties.description: Posted by Deisnor  1420 Southeast 37th Avenue, Portland, OR, 97214Favorite Second Hand clothing store in Portland- Best finds; brand new laceless Nikes with gold stripes, red Dickie\'s and a black satin/velvet bat blouse perfect for playing craps at the high stakes table in Las Vegas.

properties.name: First Impression Rubber Stamp
properties.description: Posted by Paiges  4803 NE Fremont St Portland, OR 97213Although I know little about rubber stamping, as a child my mother would often go to First Impressions and I would accompany her. From what I could tell, the staff was very friendly and were always kind to me. They also had a huge selection of stamps, and good deals that my mother would benefit from. This place is the perfect choice for any rubber-stamping enthusiast.

properties.name: Gamblin Artists Colors
properties.description: Posted by Paiges  217 Se Taylor St Portland, OR 97214 Robert Gamblin at his test mill Gamblin Artists Colors is a company dedicated to making finest quality oil painting materials and to sharing technical knowledge about painting. Gamblin artists make oil painting materials from formulae developed by Robert Gamblin to serve two purposes. First, Gamblin Artists Colors have luscious working properties so painters can enjoy each color\'s unique tinctorial and textural characteristics. Second, Gamblin finest quality oil painting materials make permanent paintings. Art materials are always best when made by those who appreciate the potential in the artist\'s mark. Some part of what is made in the Gamblin factory every day will be in the world in 500 years on a painting made by a painter like you

properties.name: Great Gatherings Thrift and Consignment Shop
properties.description: Posted by Paiges  Rainstar You Rock!passed through many hands this primarily all women run shop has landed gracefully in Rainstars lap. She has worked hard to make it successful and it shows. i go here daily. great finds. cheap prices

properties.name: Letters & Print
properties.description: Posted by Paiges  3185 SW 100th Ave Portland, OR 97225(503) 297-2155 The Print Gocco affords the user a quick and easy method for printing on a variety of papers, fabric, wood and glass. Made by the craft division of Risograph, the rapid copy machine, PRINT GOCCO is appropriate for teachers, student groups, artists, calligraphers, parent groups and small businesses.

properties.name: Oregon Leather Co
properties.description: Posted by Paiges  110 NW 2nd Ave Portland, OR 97209If it\'s leather, they have it, or can get it. Great selections and really helpful sales people. The often over-looked items are there clothing items. I bought a leather jacket from them at a fraction of the price from the "trendy" stores. This jacket had a faulty zipper (broke after two months) I took it back and they fixed it by the next day, no questions asked. They really stand behind what they sell.

properties.name: PDX Super Crafty
properties.description: Posted by Kbeadle PortlandLocal PDX crafters published a book so we can all get crafty.

properties.name: Portland Staurday Market--Every Saturday!
properties.description: Posted by Paiges    108 W Burnside St, Portland, OROpen Air Craft Fair! An Oregon tradition, this open-air market comprised of tents, booths and sidewalk displays stretches from the Burnside Bridge to the Skidmore Fountain.

properties.name: The Goodwill Bins
properties.description: Posted by Gabrielamadeus  1740 Se Ochoco St, Milwaukie, ORYessiree, the infamous goodwill bins. Read this good article if you don\'t already know: (http://www.portlandmercury.com/portland/Content?oid=31773&category=34029) Pay-by-the-Pound misc stratta leftovers from goodwill donations. Lots of junk, and some amazing treasures.

properties.name: The Red Light
properties.description: Posted by Paiges  Vintage, Resale, Trendy, Designer ClothesWarehouse sized vintage, thrift style store, resale. clothes, shoes, jackets, accesories, belts, great halloween spot. they rotate their stock regularly. you know you shop there so dont lie to me.fashionistas abound. moderate prices, face it- they got it all. I like tace very much so i wont say crap about the place thats bad. she\'\'s a cancer. she\'\'s my fam.
